Clifton.Stoney Road: Stoney Road is Paterson, New Jersey, USA's most south-west neighborhood and is bordered by Woodland Park (formerly West Paterson) to the south and Totowa across the Passaic River to the west. It is bordered on the east by Mountain Avenue and to the north by Rockland Street. This neighborhood is home to Pennington Park, Hayden Heights, Lou Costello Pool, western Grand Street, McBride Avenue and Garrett Heights.
